## hpr2457 :: Getting ready for my new Macbook Pro

 I am about to buy a new macbook pro and talk about the things I do to install and protect it.

The case
https://www.amazon.de/gp/product/B01MPYI8SA/ref=oh_aui_detailpage_o01_s00?ie=UTF8&psc=1
The Cables
https://www.amazon.de/gp/product/B06W53PXRB/ref=oh_aui_detailpage_o01_s00?ie=UTF8&psc=1
https://www.amazon.de/gp/product/B01COOQIKU/ref=oh_aui_detailpage_o01_s00?ie=UTF8&psc=1
The Screen protector
https://www.appelhoes.nl/Moshi-iVisor-AG-screenprotector-MacBook-Pro-13-inch-2016-Touch-Bar?gclid=EAIaIQobChMImvLt9PCI2AIVyTLTCh2FuwXfEAQYAiABEgJY6_D_BwE
Homebrew and Cask
https://brew.sh/
https://caskroom.github.io/
